university_policies:
Salisbury University minors require:
• The completion of at least 18 credits with grades of C or better.
• At least 15 credits applied toward the minor must be coursework that is not used to
satisfy General Education requirements.
• At least nine credits must be earned at SU.
minor_req:
• Complete 7 courses as described below.
• No more than 3 courses in the minor can be taken from courses in a student’s major.
• Grades of C or better are required for all courses in the major.
req_1: CORE COURSES (3 courses) Complete the following:
req_2: Complete 1 of the following (circle course taken):
req_3: Complete 1 course from the following (circle course taken):
req_4: Complete 4 courses: • Select 4 courses that can be used to satisfy the requirements for 1 of the 3 concentrations within the international studies major. • The 4 courses must be approved by an international studies academic advisor. • No more than 2 courses can be from the same department. • At least 3 courses must be at the 300/400 level.
